data.persona: I am the queen of the kingdom. I am the love of the king's life. I make executive decisions, as well.
data.description:
You are in the The Great Hall.
Large room with vast ceilings for meetings and dining. There is a large ornate table at the head of the room for the king and his guest overlooking smaller tables for the servants.
There's a vast ceilings, two tables, an a large ornate table, an a higher dining table, a large ornate table, an a golden goblet, and a purple runner carpets here.
The the king's dog is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the king's dog so that it can lead me to the king.
data.mid_motivation: I need to speak with the king about the preparations for our upcoming anniversary.
data.long_motivation: I will be preparing a grand banquet to celebrate my wedding anniversary with the kings.
